Deadly tornadoes hit Okla. City area

At least five people were killed, including a mother and baby, and about 50 people were hurt, five critically, as a new set of tornadoes rolled in from the prairie and slammed Oklahoma City and its suburbs on Friday.

IRS raids Boston Cab

Federal agents executed a search warrant on the city's largest cab company, which was part of a Globe series that found rampant exploitation in the industry.

A lack of wood needed to repair the replica of the 17th century ship may deprive tourists of a popular summer attraction.
